SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.Client

Interface Client

All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientRMI, ClientSocket
public interface Client
The Client interface represents a client in the game. It provides methods to interact with the game server.

  • Method Details

    • choosePlayerId

      void choosePlayerId(String playerId) throws PlayerIdAlreadyInUseException, IOException, InterruptedException, WrongMessageClassEnumException, PlayerOnlineException
      Chooses the player ID for the client.
      Parameters:
      playerId - the desired player ID
      Throws:
      PlayerIdAlreadyInUseException - if the player ID is already in use
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted
      WrongMessageClassEnumException - if the message class enumeration is wrong
      PlayerOnlineException - if the player is already online

    • addPlayerToCreatedGame

      int addPlayerToCreatedGame(String playerId) throws AlreadyStartedGameException, CreateNewGameException, IOException, InterruptedException, WrongMessageClassEnumException, NotBoundException
      Adds the player to a created game.
      Parameters:
      playerId - the player ID
      Returns:
      the game ID
      Throws:
      AlreadyStartedGameException - if the game has already started
      CreateNewGameException - if a new game creation is needed
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted
      WrongMessageClassEnumException - if the message class enumeration is wrong
      NotBoundException - if the remote object is not bound

    • createNewGameAndAddPlayer

      int createNewGameAndAddPlayer(String playerId, int maxPlayers) throws MaxNumberOfPlayersException, GameAlreadyCreatedException, AlreadyStartedGameException, IOException, InterruptedException, WrongMessageClassEnumException
      Creates a new game and adds the player to it.
      Parameters:
      playerId - the player ID
      maxPlayers - the maximum number of players in the game
      Returns:
      the game ID
      Throws:
      MaxNumberOfPlayersException - if the maximum number of players is exceeded
      GameAlreadyCreatedException - if a game has already been created
      AlreadyStartedGameException - if the game has already started
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted
      WrongMessageClassEnumException - if the message class enumeration is wrong

    • pickAndInsertInBookshelf

      void pickAndInsertInBookshelf(ArrayList<Coordinates> tilesSelection, int column, int[] order, String playerId) throws PlayerIsWaitingException, SelectionIsEmptyException, SelectionNotValidException, ColumnNotValidException, PickedColumnOutOfBoundsException, PickDoesntFitColumnException, TilesSelectionSizeDifferentFromOrderLengthException, VoidBoardTileException, WrongConfigurationException, IOException, WrongMessageClassEnumException, InterruptedException
      Picks and inserts tiles into the bookshelf.
      Parameters:
      tilesSelection - the selected tiles' coordinates
      column - the target column index
      order - the order in which the tiles are picked
      playerId - the player ID
      Throws:
      PlayerIsWaitingException - if the player is waiting
      SelectionIsEmptyException - if the selection is empty
      SelectionNotValidException - if the selection is not valid
      ColumnNotValidException - if the column is not valid
      PickedColumnOutOfBoundsException - if the picked column is out of bounds
      PickDoesntFitColumnException - if the picked tiles don't fit the column
      TilesSelectionSizeDifferentFromOrderLengthException - if the size of tilesSelection is different from the length of order
      VoidBoardTileException - if a board tile is void
      WrongConfigurationException - if the configuration is wrong
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs
      WrongMessageClassEnumException - if the message class enumeration is wrong
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted

    • checkPassword

      void checkPassword(String playerId, String password) throws WrongPasswordException, IOException, InterruptedException, WrongMessageClassEnumException, AlreadyStartedGameException, NotBoundException
      Checks the password for a player.
      Parameters:
      playerId - the player ID
      password - the password to check
      Throws:
      WrongPasswordException - if the password is incorrect
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted
      WrongMessageClassEnumException - if the message class enumeration is wrong
      AlreadyStartedGameException - if the game has already started
      NotBoundException - if the remote object is not bound
